text: Oh I see, thanks again!

:wave: Hello, team!. Am trying to verify the app in localhost. Its not working. I am getting this error "*Couldn’t complete the connection*
The redirect_uri doesn't match the client registered redirect_uri. Please contact the app developer".
Redirect URI i gave localhost
Anyone please explain what will be the issue. Thanks

I wanted to create a new line_item to associate it with a deal…

I tried changing price to amount but the values but it didn’t work as well. ://

the product is being created, but without any of the values I sent :melting_face:
This message was deleted.

Hello everyone,

Has anyone had any problems with the HubSpot GET API Call for marketing emails? I am noticing that some of the the email information for sends is not being sent over in the API. And I am wondering if anyone knows why this is? I cannot seem to find a correlation between why some email sends are sent via API and a couple are not. These are all marketing emails I am referencing.

UPDATE: I think it could be tied to an limit on the API. Does anyone understand how the limit works? Is it saying the API is limited to 300 records per call?

Hello, Isaac
May these emails be invalid? having some invalid characters or some typo like .con, white space, missing .com, etc
of course
no to the best of my understanding that isn't the problem. Based on someone else I was talking with I think it might be a limit problem. Do you understand the limit parameters?
And did you copy the install url for the app settings page?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1677872861498499>
Yeah that's very strange, let me run a couple of tests when I get to my office

any error/warning msg?
it's also worth to check here
you'll be able to see a daily limit in this place too
here there are more details <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/usage-details>
Yes. Now the error is gone. I didn't update the local url. That's the problem
thanks for all the help <@U01QVR44MEY> :pray:
Perfect
Yes of course, sorry I didn't point that out. I thought you were already doing that but just were showing the mini request to show the issue you were having

Hi, How do we have a place holder in template for inner object in JSON like below .

"customProperties": {
        "firstName": "Prakasam",
        "lastName": "Sadhasivam",
        "orderNumber": "0700003000",
        "subTotal": "$10.0",
        "totalDiscounts": "$0.0",
        "deliveryCost": "",
        "totalPriceWithTax": "$10.0",
        "totalTax": "$0.0",
        "deliveryAddress": {
            "id": "8796289728535",
            "title": "Mr",
            "titleCode": "mr",

I just tried this way {{custom.deliveryAddress.title}} but it did not work.
Can you help?

hello, I created a Private App and generated Access Token, I then tried to make API call to get the schema of all objects.

`/crm/v3/schemas` but it returned empty list. Can someone help? thanks
do you want to run a quick test by requesting the /crm/v3/schemas/contacts schema?
pretty strange /contacts gives a response but not the generic one
that is actually the generic one
And you do have a custom object deployed in your portal?
Hello guys, I want to create associations by batch and I would like to know the maximum number of records allowed. Any idea?
It should be 10
I couldn't find a solid answer anywhere though, I think it would be 100 at the max
The v1 endpoint: /crm-associations/v1/associations/create-batch has a 100 association limit (100 pairs, so 200 records)
but I can't find any limit for the v3/v4 endpoints
Yeah, neither I. I'll use pagination just in case, really hope it's not 10 haha.
Yeah I think it's 100
Thanks Sr
of course
can this API return all object schemas? `/crm/v3/schemas`
it returns custom objects schemas
is there a way to get default object schema?
Hey there.. I'm trying to get the HubSpot "search contact" API call to work, but I keep getting a "405 - Method Not Allowed"..  Any ideas??
You want to make sure you're using POST not GET
